DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study protocol collect image data embryo follow blastocyst stage ( Day 5-6 ) correlate Eeva parameter array - Comparative Genomic Hybridization ( aCGH ) result ongoing pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: Correlating Time-Lapse Parameters With aCGH Testing IVF Treatment ( aCGH Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The present study design determine correlation Eeva System parameter aCGH test result . Embryos select transfer base aCGH result morphology . The Clinical site access Eeva analysis time transfer .
DOC.criteria: Subject ≤43 year age . Women undergo IVF treatment plan aCGH test use egg donor egg . Antral Follicle Count ≥ 6 time cycle start Baseline ( day 23 cycling ) FSH ≤ 15 mIU/ml Antimüllerian Hormone level ≥ 0.5 ng/mL Fertilization use ejaculated sperm ( fresh frozen ) surgically retrieve sperm . Willing 2PN embryo monitor Eeva Not previously enrol study . Willing comply study protocol procedure able speak English . Willing provide write informed consent . BMI ≥ 40 Prior IVF cycle < 4 x 2PN Planned Day 3 Assisted Hatching
